headline: Expanded AI Data Center Power Deal Might Change The Case For Investing In Baker Hughes (BKR)
summary: Baker Hughes recently announced it will supply 25 BRUSH Power Generation electric generators, plus control equipment, to Boom Supersonic, expanding an earlier 6-unit order to support 1.21 gigawatts of onsite power for Crusoe’s AI data centers from mid-2026 through 2028. This deal highlights Baker Hughes’ push beyond traditional oilfield services into power solutions for AI and high-performance computing infrastructure, aligning its energy technology capabilities with rising data center...

headline: Cactus Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Cactus (NYSE:WHD) executives highlighted what they described as a strong finish to 2025, pointing to better-than-expected performance in Pressure Control and sustained profitability in Spoolable Technologies, while also outlining early priorities and expectations following the closing of its acquisi
